column1: short and wide outside off stump, comes on nicely and he guides it through cover point
back of a length, shaping away slightly in the corridor. Defended into the covers
good length, swinging away from the corridor. Dabs it to third man off the front foot
short and wide outside off, slapped straight to cover point
short of a length and angled away, carved on the up to third man
back of a length at leg stump, pushed to midwicket to on the up
short and spinning wide outside off, cut to extra cover off the toe-end
short and wide outside off, waits for it and cuts easily to the point boundary
short and climbing up outside off. Shapes to cut but adjusts for the bounce and times the slice nicely to beat backward point
back of a length at off stump, pushed to extra cover off the back foot
good length outside off, skids on off the surface. Big inside edge into the leg side as he looks to push on the front foot
flat, short and wide outside off, chopped easily past slip
good length, into the pads. Flicked straight to midwicket
back of a length in the corridor, tapped back to the bowler on the up
offcutter, back of a length at middle stump. Steps out and holds his balance before swiping this to the midwicket boundary. Head was very still
back of a length at off stump, shuffles across the flicks to deep square
back of a length on the pads, bunted in front of deep square
back of a length in the corridor, looks to drive on the up, gets it to midwicket off the inside half
back of a length, angled across off stump. Under-edges the cut to point
back of a length in the corridor, squeezed to cover on the up
good length outside off, walks down the pitch and drives on the up to mid-off. Mistimed a tad
good length at off stump, driven on the up to mid-off
back of a length outside off, a controlled tap past the non-striker this time and he beats mid-off's dive. Mid-on gets across and scoops it back in but the momentum takes it into the boundary
back of a length, angled across off stump. Punched to mid-off on the up
back of a length outside off, pushed into the covers on the up
good length in the corridor, punched on the up into the covers
back of a length on the pads, whipped to deep square
good length on middle stump, closes the face and turns it to deep square from under his eyes
back of a length on the pads, shovelled to deep square
length ball, down leg side
back of a length in the corridor, chopped straight to short third man

back of a length outside off, holds a strong base and caresses this on the up through point. Good job from the fielder, looks like Sabbir, who sprints from backward point and pulls it back in with a slide
back of a length at middle stump, tapped against the angle to midwicket
length ball outside off, gives it the charge and slashes across the line. Gets it to midwicket
lovely shot. Full ball outside off stump, stretches out for it and uses his wrists to beat cover point's dive
back of a length on middle stump, gets a leading edge to mid-off as he looks to flick
back of a length at middle stump, flicked wide of deep square
back of a length at leg stump, turned off the hips to short fine
beauty. Oh so good. Good length outside off stump, leans into it and drives past cover on the up. So much balance. They like him in the Powerplay for this ability to beat the infield
offcutter, good length in the corridor. Defended down the pitch
short and wide outside off stump, third man is in, sweeper is back. He finds sweeper with a punch
back of a length in the corridor, pushed to mid-off on the up
back of a length offcutter at off stump. Looks to punch it on the up through midwicket. Inside edge onto the pad
arm ball, full and hitting the pads in front of leg stump as he looks to flick. It was going down
slider, back of a length into leg stump, pushed wide of mid-on off the back foot
good length at leg stump, pushed to mid-on with soft hands
good length at off stump, defended solidly on the front foot
good length at leg stump, defended down the pitch
oh great shot. Knows the angle is into him, steps out and gets to the pitch before flicking this wide of mid-on. Top class batting
back of a length, skids on quickly in the corridor as he looks to punch with an angled bat. Inside edge evades the stumps
back of a length outside off, leans into the angle and taps it through the covers
nicely done. Walks down the pitch and punches this length ball on the up past the non-striker
back of a length in the corridor, punched firmly on the up but finds cover point
back of a length in the corridor, tapped to mid-on
back of a length outside off, chopped to third man on the up
oh this is brutal. Tossed up at off stump, he steps down and makes room by contorting his body and sends this flying over the long-off boundary
good length at leg stump, pushed to mid-on on the up
good length outside off, reaches out with a stride and paddles it to short fine's right...he stops with a dive
full at leg stump, steps out and taps to long-on
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
good length at off stump, down the track. Not to the pitch, but manages to drive to long-off on the up
short and into the ribs but it's an imperious pull shot, straight to deep square
short and angled down leg side, turned to fine leg with a whip
back of a length into the pads, climbs on him but he gets on top of it and times the punch nicely to get it well to deep square's left
good length at leg stump, loose push in front of the body, thick inside edge to fine leg
back of a length at middle at middle stump, pushed hurriedly as he's cramped on this. Midwicket dives to his right and under-arm flicks at the non-strikers stumps. Well fielded
toe-ended chip clears the bowler and runs past mid-on. It's a short ball from over the wicket, outside off. He gets it off the bottom as he looks to pull but it lands wide of all fielders
full and flat outside off, squeezed wide of sweeper cover
good length at off stump, pushed into the covers on the front foot
full at leg stump, flicked to square leg
good length outside off, flicked towards long-on...but midwicket dives to his left and cuts it off
full at leg stump, flicks it towards long-on. Bowler dives to his right but can't cut it off entirely. They steal the single as it bobbles behind him
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot

short ball outside off, looks to pull and gets an inside edge onto pad again. Holds the pose but soon realises Bavuma is sprinting through for a single. Reacts late and runs. Point swoops down and sends in a nice under-arm flick but probably went to the wrong end
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to mid-on on the up
short ball at the rubs, gets on top of the bounce and pulls to fine leg
short ball in the corridor, rises on him and he tries to ramp it over the keeper. Too high
shot. Steps out and meets it on the rise outside off, then punches it flat over the bowler's head

full toss on the pads, flicked between fine leg and deep square. Fine leg sprints a long way to his left and just manages to keep it in with his left-hand. Superb fielding. Bangladesh have been sharp today
short ball outside off, climbs too fast on him as he shapes to play the pull. Lets it go
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
full at off stump, driven to extra cover
full outside off stump, driven straight to extra cover
good length outside off, squeezed past extra cover off the front foot
good length at middle stump, pushed past midwicket on the front foot
full at off stump, driven to long-off to bring up his fifty
back of a length outside off, tapped to sweeper cover
good length outside off, pushed to sweeper cover on the up
full outside off, stands tall, opens the face a touch and punches it over the mid-off
good length at off stump, tapped to point...who throws at the non-strikers end, hits the stumps and gives away four through mid-on
full outside off, driven to mid-off off the bottom of the bat
back of a length at leg stump, swivels and turns it to fine leg with a hoick
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
full at middle stump, steps out and flicks to deep midwicket
good length at leg stump, flicked to deep square
length outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
full at middle stump, driven to long-on
good length outside off, slashes at it and gets a big outside edge that races to the boundary
good length at leg stump, driven on the up to mid-on
full at leg stump, driven to mid-on
back of a length in the corridor, flicked through square leg
short and into the hips, whipped between fine leg and deep square
back of a length at off stump, punched past the bowler from the crease
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
back of a length at middle stump, makes room and pushes to extra cover
sho
tossed up at middle stump, driven to long-on
back of a length outside off, defended into the off side
finds long-on with a loose shot. Steps out and can't get to the pitch. Wants to go inside-out but the turn does him. Chips it feebly to long-on who follows it as it dips and snaps it low in front
back of a length and angled in at middle stump, backs away and cuts to point
full and straying into the pads, Faf neatly clips through square leg
dangled up full on off, non-turner, blocked back to the bowler
on a length and outside off, smoothly driven to the left of short cover. The fielder tumbles to his left to intercept the ball
floated up and drifts in on middle, tapped down to long-on
lobbed up just outside off, de Kock forays down the track and drives towards mid-on
full on the stumps, he uses his feet again, and strokes the ball to the same fielder
flicked with the break to deep midwicket as this was full on off
skids on off, a bit too close to cut, chopped away through the cover-point region
looped up outside off, Faf stays leg side of the ball, and drives it firmly to wide long-off
full, straight ball on off, eased to sweeper cover off the front foot
An appeal for caught behind, not given by umpire Shaun George. Offbreak, grips, turns, beats the inside edge. Loops off the pad to the keeper. No bat involved

A mix-up between the wickets. De Kock dishes out a full-length dive at the striker's end and eventually completes the single in time. Faf stays leg side of the ball, opens the face, dabs it to the left of short cover and eyes up a quick single. His partner was slow to respond but gets away with a big dive
on a length and outside off, Faf drives with the wrists to the off-side sweeper
The batsman slinks down the track, Shakib drags his length back on middle stump, whipped away to deep midwicket
slower through the air and drifting down leg for a wide
dangled up outside off, Faf thrusts his hands out for a drive and ends up inside-edging it back to the bowler
non-turning length ball outside off, flayed away through the covers
De Kock dashes down the track again, fetches a short ball from outside off, and swats a single down to long-on
slides on outside off, flatter, punched on the up to short cover

Mehidy strikes twice in three overs! He bags the big wicket of de Kock now. The batsman forays down the track again and looks to force the ball over midwicket against the turn. Mehidy did well to hold this offbreak back outside off. De Kock is nowhere close to the pitch and ends up flapping a return catch via a leading edge
driven with the break through the gap at midwicket
full offbreak, tickled away to backward square leg with the turn
back of a length and skids back in, cramps the batsman for room, nurdled away fine of backward square leg for a well-judged single
chipped away to the right of midwicket. Faf controlled it well enough to evade the fielder
full and straight, picked away off the pads to deep midwicket
full on middle and leg, defended to midwicket
back of a length on off, punched off the back foot square through the off side
tossed on off, defended
flatter and faster on middle, whipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
lobbed up on middle, not much turn, defended
short on off, Markram stands tall and punches a single down to long-on
pushed through on off, poked to point off an outside edge

shot, Markram! Tossed-up offbreak outside off, he sees the flight, saunters down the track and effortlessly lofts it with the break over the long-on boundary. He met the pitch of the ball and timed it sweetly
hurled shorter on off, blocked off the back foot
near yorker on of stump, jabbed back to the bowler
back-of-a-length offbreak, turned with the spin to midwicket
darted short on middle, punched down to long-on
tossed on middle, the batsman bends forward and defends
pushed through on off, non-turner, driven down to long-off
drifts in towards the pads, flipped through square leg
tossed up and drifting down leg, wide
tossed up, Shakib held this back, the batsman used his feet and nearly chipped it to short cover
Shakib attacks the stumps, driven to mid-on off the front foot
back of a length on middle, backs away outside leg and slashes a single to sweeper cover
pushed through outside off, carved off the outside half to point off the back foot
darted on off, bunted to cover
skids in on off, skewed to midwicket off the inside half now
slower just outside off, Faf stretches out and sweeps it flat and hard to the backward square leg boundary. Fine execution from Faf
tossed-up offbreak, Faf closes the face early and leading-edges it in front of the bowler
this is even better from Faf, he clears the fine-leg boundary. Tossed up liberally outside off, he stretches out again and pings a slog-sweep. Fetch that!
back of a length on middle, the batsman stays leg side of the ball and punches a single to sweeper cover
full on off, patted to cover
Faf steps out and drives a full ball to the right of a tumbling short cover to long-off
low-arm slider, the batsman makes room and hastily chops it through cover point
Faf uses his feet again, he gets too close to the pitch, and ends up jabbing a single down to long-off
dangled up outside off, drilled through the line to deep cover
tossed outside off, Markram pre-meditates a scoop and laps the ball down to fine leg
short and flat on middle, forced to the left of short midwicket
full and outside off, carved away to backward point, where Taskin makes a tumbling save to his right
Shakib drags his length back on middle, down the track and punched down to long-on
leg-side wide, wayward delivery - speared way down leg
full and straight, Faf sits back and turns the ball to the right of midwicket
seam-up ball on middle and leg, this half-tracker is hit only to deep midwicket
tossed outside off, Faf lunges forward and belts it straight to cover
short and wide outside off, Faf hammers a cut to backward point. The ball bursts through the hands of Sabbir
arm ball, whipped with the angle to deep midwicket
Faf steps out, Shakib drags his length back on the stumps, quietly pushed down the ground to long-on for one
down the track and whipped off the pads to deep midwicket. Markram keeps ticking along
floated up outside off, Faf slices the ball straight to backward point
flat on middle and leg, forced off the back foot to short midwicket's left
rank long hop on leg or outside leg, Markram ventures deep in the crease and bashes it over midwicket. Boom
short and wide outside off - asking to be punished again - Markram obliges and flays it off the back foot to the cover-point boundary
on a length and outside off, no turn, whipped across the line to wide long-on
Faf calls for two and gets it easily in the end. Veering into the pads, flicked neatly through square leg

tossed outside off, Faf runs down the track but the ball dips, creating distance between the bat and the pitch. He still goes through with a big drive and slices an outside edge but there's nobody at slip to snap it up
pushed through full on middle, driven down to long-on
tossed up higher on middle, but it's hit down to long-on again
driven with the break to sweeper cover
Faf uses his feet and punches a single down to long-on
short and wide, this legbreak is cracked away to the left of sweeper cover. Sabbir can't stop the flow of runs. Nice way to bring up the 200 for SA in the 31st over
on a length and outside off, driven on the up to cover
short and wide outside off, flat-batted to cover
just short of a good length and outside off, Faf punches straight to cover again
slower cutter on off, tip and run in front of cover for one. They get another off an overthrow
full and straight, Faf hangs back and smartly works the ball to the right of midwicket
back of a length and outside off, sits up to be hit, shovelled away to wide long-on
This is shovelled away to the right of wide long-on. Faf races down the track and whips it away wide of the fielder
full and outside off, opens the face and runs it to backward point
back of a length on off, jabbed back to the bowler
tossed up on off, driven down to long-on for a jogged single
pushed through on off, worked away through square leg
tapped from outside off to long-on again
slides on outside off, flayed away through the covers
short and outside off, punched on the up to the off-side sweeper
Faf slinks around in the crease, Mashrafe puts it full and outside off. This is hacked away to the midwicket boundary off the inside half
back of a length on off, manipulated to point off an open face
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to mid-off
slower short ball outside off, strongly pulled away to deep midwicket
full and wide outside off, Faf, having stepped out, shovels it to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, chopped away to backward point
tossed on middle, patted to the right of midwicket for a single
back of a length and angling across off from around the wicket, punched in the gap at cover
tossed on middle and leg, Faf clears his front leg and drills a drive to long-on
short and angling away outside off, Markram is swift to pick the length up - he rocks back and crunches a cut to the left of short cover. That's dismissive
near yorker on off, which is jabbed back down the ground. Fifty on ODI debut for Markram
back of a length and on the stumps, Markram punches on the up to long-on
on a length and outside off, Faf had pre-meditated, shuffling across off and scooping away fine of long leg. Great execution
and again! Mashrafe is probably ready to tear his hair out. On a length and outside off again, Faf ventures a long way across off and ramps it away in the same direction - fine of long leg
short and outside off, Faf makes more room by moving away outside leg and flaying the ball to sweeper cover
slower cutter outside off, Markram presses forward and slices this 111kph ball to sweeper cover
shot, Faf has cranked up to top gear. He hurtles down the track, Mashrafe goes short and wide outside off. Faf fetches it and flat-bats it straight past the bowler.
good length, in at middle stump. Makes room and pokes it wide of extra cover

back of a length at off stump, squeezes it wide of long-off from the crease. The fielder hits the stumps direct. No one appeals...until Mushfiqur does so belatedly. To Faf's annoyance. Sent upstairs. Not out
back of a length at leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
good length, flat outside off. Steps out and jams to long-off
in the blockhole at middle stump, inside edges onto pad as he looks to drive wide of long-on. Deflected into the off side
dropped. Short ball just outside off. Backs away and makes a lot of room to play the cut. Thick outside edge brushes the keeper's right glove and dribbles to the boundary
back of a length in the corridor, dropped pitch side with soft hands
back of a length into leg stump, plants the front leg across and flicks this aerially between long-on and deep midwicket
short ball down leg side, swings hard with the pull to find fine leg
short and wide outside off, uses the pace and cuts late. Sweeper cover sprints and slides to his left, but he can only manage to parry it wider and into the boundary. A good effort
overpitched on the pads, clipped wide of fine leg
steps out and is forced to adjust because it's a slower ball. It's on leg stump and he meets it at the pitch after waiting, before hammering it between Markram and the stumps
good length at middle stump, steps out and pushes it back down the pitch
back of a length at middle, makes room and squeezes to sweeper cover
good length, in at leg stump. Flicked to midwicket
arm ball, angled in at off stump. He walks across and laps it behind square on the leg side. Deep midwicket comes across a long way
back of a length at middle stump, steps out and doesn't get to the pitch. Looks to slap it on the up over extra cover, gets an inside edge into the leg side
short ball outside off, spins away and makes the pull difficult. He lobs it towards deep midwicket
good length, swung in at off stump. Stands tall and punches it past the bowler. Beats him. Beats mid-off. Beats long-on.
yorker at off stump, jammed out to extra cover
slower ball, back of a length and wide outside off. Steps out and makes too much room. Can't get bat after stretching for it
yorker at off stump, squeezed into the off side
good length, shaping down leg. Can't get bat as he looks to whip it. Leg-before appeal turned down
back of a length at middle stump, turned to deep midwicket with a checked pull

offcutter, good length at off stump. Stretches forward and flicks to deep midwicket....and Faf runs back hard as they try to complete the tight second. He's on the floor now, holding his left glute. On the other end, Markram would have been run out if the throw had hit direct....seems like a muscle catch for Faf. He pulled up as he was turning to come back for the second. Physio is stretching out the glutes and hamstrings. He's used assistance to get back up on his feet, so this doesn't look good....hobbling uncomfortably as he grips his lower back on the left side. His right hamstring was tested to see if it wasn't a groin tear. He passed that test. Looks like a left hip muscle issue now...and he's being assisted off the field. AB de Villiers has made his way out. Du Plessis' being piggybacked off the field for the last few yards.
good length in the corridor, driven back at the bowler
back of a length at middle stump, pushed back at the bowler
steps out and checks his shot. It's a length ball outside off and it looks like a weak chip over the bowler. But the outfield is quicker than long-off
back of a length at middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket

offcutter, back of a length at middle stump...poked through square leg and this time there is a direct hit from the deep. Markram survived the last one but the dive looks unlikely to have saved him here....sent upstairs. Yes, that's out. Kayes the fielder
back of a length on leg stump, forcefully flicked to midwicket
good length, tailing in at off stump. Looks to drive on the up, gets an inside edge through square leg
back of a length at off stump, poked to extra cover on the up
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
overpitched, swinging in at off stump. Driven to sweeper cover who fumbles and allows the second
offcutter, back of a length at leg stump. Pushed between fine leg and deep square to come back for the second
overpitched at off stump, pushed straight to extra cover
legcutter, back of a length outside off. Dabbed straight to point
good length, angled in at off stump. Watchfully pushed down the pitch
overpitched at off stump, driven to long-off
oh geez, here we go. Full and in at off stump. Gets well under it and is almost backing away as he slices this over the extra cover boundary
back of a length at off stump, nudged wide of long-on
good length, wide and swinging in from outside off. Slashed to sweeper cover

full and swinging into leg stump. Can't get the flick shot away. Deflected off the pad into the gully region... oh they've reviewed it. Two-and-a-half stumps visible on the first replay. That's definitely going down. Review lost.
good shot. Full and swinging in at off stump, gets forward and meets it on the full before caressing this wide of extra cover
back of a length outside off, jabbed on the up to sweeper's left
back of a length in the corridor, backs away and taps it to sweeper cover with a flat bat
good length at off stump, backs away and looks to slash. Doesn't quite come on. Rolls back down the pitch
yorker at middle stump, squeezed in front of deep midwicket who can't stop the second
full and wide outside off, can't get under this. Slices to sweeper cover
short ball outside off, might have been an offcutter. He looks to pull through midwicket and gets an under-edge through to the keeper
slower ball, short and wide again. This time he holds the shape and waits for it to come on, before punching it aerially, wide of mid-off
short and into the body, swivels and places the pull to perfection. Well watched after two slower bouncers. This one is placed between fine leg and deep square
mishits an overpitched ball and slices it in the cover region. This was in the slot for AB, but he has gone too hard at it. It hangs for Mashrafe to dive to his left at extra cover
back of a length at off stump, poked through the covers
yorker tails in sharply at off stump, he keeps it out and gets a single at mid-off
short ball at middle stump, swats it powerfully to deep midwicket
full and swinging in at off stump. Late to react and he gets an inside edge onto pad
full and in at off stump, driven to long-on
yorker at middle stump and he's trapped in front. Looks to flick it with the swing and can't get bat on it. Might have been marginal with the review, but they won't take it.
back of a length at leg stump, stands tall in the crease and clips this off his hips to beat deep square leg on his left
full and just outside off, drives it to extra cover's right and can't beat him
full toss outside off stump, thick outside edge to third man as he looks to slash through point
yorker at leg stump, tapped to long-on
well bowled! Swings it away from the left-hander in the corridor, he looks to drive without feet and gets a thin outside edge. Long appeal and the umpire says yes
full and swung in at middle stump, driven back down the pitch at the bowler who is late to respond
short ball at middle stump, pulled aerially to deep square's right
outswinging yorker at leg stump, defended to midwicket
yorker on the toes floors him as he looks to flick. Sensational bowling
full and moving away from off, sliced to sweeper cover
yorker at off stump, jammed to extra cover after making some room
yorker at leg stump, can't beat midwicket with the flick
misses the length on his yorker. It's a wide full toss, but too quick for Rabada. Can't get bat on the drive
short ball at middle stump, swivels and pulls well in front of square. Wide of and above mid-on, to be precise. He runs in pursuit but can't pull this back in
full at leg stump, a feeble check-drive as this grips in the pitch as it moves away. It lands short of long-on
yorker into the toes, backs away to get them out of danger and drives to long-on
lovely shot. Stays deep in the crease, lets this swing away and watches it into the overpitched area outside off before opening the face and squeezing this over extra cover
yorker at off stump, forced to extra cover off the bottom of the bat
whew. Full toss tailing away from off stump. Follows the angle and ramps it way over fine leg
backs away into the leg side this time and smashes the full toss through extra cover. Missing the length on his yorker again. Rabada has hit the same ball to opposite corners
length ball swinging away from middle, takes the outer half of the bat and dribbles to long-off as he looks to pull
overpitched outside off, backs away and drives straight to sweeper cover
full and angled in at leg stump. Goes deep in the crease and slogs across the line. Doesn't middle this. Toe-ends it, but he gets it between long-on and deep midwicket
good length at leg stump, flicked to fine leg's right
back of a length outside off, guided to third man with an open face
back of a length, angled across off stump. Left alone
back of a length at off stump, flicked straight to midwicket
back of a length outside off, poked to point on the up
back of a length at middle stump flicked to square leg
back of a length on the leg stump, thuds into the thigh guard as he looks to glance it
taken at mid-off. Back of a length outside off stump, looks to drive through the line and over mid-off but gets it high on the bat. It dips on Behardien but it's simple in the end
good length outside off, left alone despite the angle inward
back of a length outside off, not behind this completely. Gets a big outside edge as he pokes but manages to keep it down and wide of second slip
back of a length, in at middle stump. Watches it closely and flicks past square leg
back of a length in the corridor, defended to point with an open face
very full - near yorker - tailing into leg stump, Sarkar jams his bat down hastily and keeps it out
follows the near yorker with a chest-high bouncer on middle, leaves the batsman in a tangle, he nearly plops a catch to backward point
Rabada hunts for the yorker, ends up overpitching it on off stump, and watches Sarkar whip it away through midwicket
pace and bounce from Rabada. Short and rises outside off, Sarkar rises on top of the bounce and times it sweetly through the covers
back of a length on middle, clipped away nicely but Andile tumbles to his left from short midwicket and stops the ball. Good save
short and cramps the batsman, Sarkar fends it beside his fet
just short of a good length and outside off, Liton opens the face and pats the ball to cover

Paterson belts out an appeal for lbw, and the finger goes up. Liton confers with his partner and turns down a review. This was full and angling into middle, Liton plays around his front pad, and falls over the flick. It was pretty adjacent, and fast bowler wins an lbw verdict from umpire Shaun George - his second wicket in his first two overs. The tracker suggests that it would have just clipped the top of leg stump
pitched up on off, nearly 140ks, defended off the front foot
short of a length and angled down leg, no shot, wide
back of a length and angling in, defended on off stump
short, wide, four. Poor ball, and Mushfiq punishes it. He extends his hands and slashes a square cut
back of a length and heading towards the top of off - tighter from Paterson - Mushfiq stops it in its tracks
pitched up and outside off, forward and driven through the line to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, Sarkar stays leg side of the ball and hacks it away to cover
full and outside off, Sarkar attempts to drive on the up and slices it in the air.... but it does not carry to Duminy at short cover
rising short ball on middle, 138ks, Sarkar rises with it and pats it down

Sarkar slashes a thick outside edge to slip. Great reflexes from Markram, taking a head-high catch to his left. Back of a length and holds its line wide outside off, from around the wicket, the batsman throws his hands at a drive and nicks off. Poor, poor shot selection
short and outside off from around the wicket, Shakib drops his wrists, and wraps up a wicket-maiden
short and slanting in at the top of off, blocked solidly
back of a length and nips back in, Mushfiq presses halfway forward and squirts an inside edge onto the pad
Mushfiq charges down the track, the quick pulls his length back outside off. Mushfiq splices it to the left of Behardien at mid-off
full on off and middle, pushed back down the pitch to mid-on
short on the leg stump, cramps Shakib for room. But he still swivels on the back foot and hooks it away towards long leg, where KG makes a mess of it and lets the ball away to the boundary
full on the stumps, Shakib moves forward and push-drives to mid-on
short and on the hips, helped away to fine leg off the back foot
short but too close to cut, Shakib chops it away to mid-off, where the fielder (Behardien) fumbles, gifting a double. Two misfields in two overs
bouncer outside off, Shakib rocks his head out of the way
full and outside off, driven on the up to the right of Behardien at mid-off. No fumbles here
back of a length and angling in, Mushfiq stabs it to cover
slower, full ball outside off, 124ks, this change-up is sliced away wide of backward point
back of a length and angling in on off, tucked into the gap at midwicket for one
full and angling into the pads, deflected away square through the leg side
not a half-volley on middle, good length, Shakib takes it on the up and firmly drives it past the bowler
full on the stumps, driven again, this time right back to the bowler
fizzing bouncer on middle, flies past Shakib's hurried hook. De Kock leaps to collect the ball
follows the bouncer with an inswinging yorker, squeezed out to midwicket
full on the stumps worked to midwicket
back of a length and slanted in on off, Mushfiq presses forward and blocks it back
back of a length on off, hangs back and drops the ball defensively to cover
leg-stump short ball, swivel-pulled away to fine leg
half-volley on middle and leg, handsomely flicked to midwicket, where Andile dives to his right and stops the ball with his right hand. Parries it towards the bowler
banged down leg, beats the hook, leg-side wide
lifter on leg stump, nearly 140ks, forces Mushfiq to duck under it
short and outside off, Shakib reaches out for the ball with his hands and stabs to cover
short and wide outside off, glided to point
pitched up and outside off, Shakib stretches out and creams a drive between mid-off and cover. So easy on the eye...
leg-stump half-volley, duly whipped away square of Rabada at fine leg for back-to-back boundaries
length ball on off, Shakib punches the ball to mid-on and hares across for the single
an appeal for caught behind, not given. Full and slanting down the leg side, Mushfiq does not make contact with a flick. The ball might have brushed the pad on its way to the keeper
really full on off, presses forward and jams it to backward point
short and too close to cut, chopped wide of backward point, to third man
full and angling down leg, tickled behind to de Kock, who moves quickly to his left to stop the ball with one hand
full and straight, Mushfiq shuffles across and works it to midwicket
wide of the crease, speared full on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
short and wide outside off, carved away to deep third man
full on off, chipped past the left of the bowler
full around off, whipped off the front foot to mid-on

Musfiq holes out, leaving Bangladesh four down. He runs down the track, looking to take on Adile and mid-off, but he does not get close to the pitch of this full, wide ball. He ends up slicing a loft straight down the throat of Rabada
tucked off the pads to deep midwicket
back of a length on off, defended
back of a length on the leg stump, clipped away to long leg
pretty full on middle, patted in front of short midwicket for a speedy single
pitched up and outside off, sticks in the surface and foils Shakib's drive. He scoops it to the right of the bowler, the ball lands in front of mid-off
off-stump yorker, 139ks, dug out
pitched up and outside off, Shakib drives in the air again, to the left of the bowler

A mix-up between the wickets but no harm done for Bangladesh. Back of a length on off, guided to backward point. Shakib ventures halfway down the track, but Mahmudullah was ball-watching all the way. The fielder collects the ball but misses a direct hit at the striker's end
banged in short on middle, Shakib miscues a pull onto the pitch
full on the pads, forward and whipped to midwicket
on a length and outside off, Shakib hits on the up, drilling a drive through the covers
short on off, cramps Shakib for room, stabbed back to the bowler
pitched up on off, forward and driven to mid-off
short and outside off, chopped down to third man
really full on the pads, clipped away to deep midwicket
fullish and outside off, tapped to cover off the front foot
Mulder strikes on ODI debut, having Mahmudullah lbw. Good length on middle stump, the batsman plays all around a straight ball and is pinned in front. It would have crashed into leg stump
full and holds its line outside off, no shot
full and angling in on off, Sabbir hangs back and defends to the leg side. Mulder knocked the bails off while delivering the ball - so that's a no-ball
the free-hit is a half-volley outside off, creamed away to sweeper cover
full and on off, Shakib shuffles across and defends
fullish and outside off, Sabbir moves forward and pushes it to short cover
full and angling in on off, Sabbir blocks to short midwicket
back of a length on off, blocked off the back foot
full and straight, defended back down the pitch
shortish and outside off, Sabbir throws his bat at it... and misses
nip-backer from Andile, back of a length, Sabbir camps back and nearly drags it back onto the stumps
pitched up on off, Shakib presses forward and drives to mid-on
on a length and outside off, Shakib drives on the up to the left of cover and to the right of mid-off. Behardien chases hard from mid-off and tracks it down
tucked off the pads to long leg for one
short and angling into a tight defence on off
back of a length and slanted in on off, defended back off the back foot
short and wide outside off, Sabbir flashes a cut to short cover
back of a length on the stumps, slower ball at 118ks, turned to deep square leg
back of a length and angling into off, nurdled past the right of midwicket
back of a length on middle, tucked away through midwicket
shortish and outside off, Sabbir rides the bounce and directs the ball to third man
back of a length and cramps the batsman for room, worked to midwicket
back of a length on off, whipped away to deep midwicket
pitched up and outside off, Shakib scoops a drive in front of mid-off
full on the stumps, driven to mid-on
back of a length and just outside off, Sabbir steps out and flaps a pull in the air to the right of midwicket
picked off the pads to fine leg
short on top of off, fended back to Mulder
too close to cut, chopped away to third man
starts off with a half-tracker that turns outside off, crashed away to wide long-off
Tahir unfurls the googly, full and breaks back in, Sabbir does not pick it. The inside edge saves him
short on middle, punched down to long-off
length-ball legbreak, Shakib runs it to backward point off the back foot
tossed on off, full, Shakib stretches out and eases a single to long-off
Tahir holds this legbreak back outside off, Sabbir defends off the front foot
back of a length in the corridor, nips away and beats the outside edge as he looks to dab at it
short and wide outside off, looks to guide it to third man. Under-edges into the pitch
good length at off stump, defended from the crease
good length at off stump, pushed back to the bowler on the up
back of a length at off stump, tapped to long-off
good length outside off, stabs at it away from the body and gets a thick outside edge past the only slip
googly, back of a length at off stump. Pushed to extra cover off the back foot
googly, pitches on middle stump, spins and bounces a long way past the outside edge as he presses forward
slider, back of a length across off stump, beaten on the outside edge as he pokes with no feet
googly, back of a length outside off. Outside edge to short third man as he looks to cut
tossed up at off stump, driven uppishly past extra cover to long-off's right
googly, spins back in from outside off. Defended off the back foot
good length, angled in at off stump. Pushed down the pitch on the up
short and into the body, swivels to use the pace and shovel it to the fine leg boundary
good length at middle stump, punched to mid-on
back of a length in the corridor, flicked to midwicket on the up
back of a length outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
back of a length, slanted down leg side, past the attempted flick
back of a length, angled in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
length on middle, glanced to deep square from the crease and that's his 35th ODI fifty
good length, off stump, pushed to extra cover
length, middle stump. Steps out to drive to long-on
googly, back of a length on middle. Picks and defends with the turn from deep in the crease
googly, back of a length outside off, poked into the covers
good length outside off, driven on the rise to long-off
full and in at leg stump. Half stride as he drives to mid-on
back of a length on off stump, turned to deep square from the crease
good length, angled into middle stump. Flays at it away from his body and gets an inside edge down to long leg
length and into leg stump, flicked to fine leg
offcutter, back of a length and in at off stump. Defended down the pitch
shot. Steps out at this length ball and holds his shape to lift it cleanly over mid-on
tossed up outside off, gets to the pitch and slogs it over midwicket with a lot of power, with the turn
slider, back of a length at off stump. Guided to backward point with an open face
full at off stump, driven back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, pushed to extra cover off the back foot
googly, length at off stump. Spits at the forward defensive and takes the outside edge
back of a length at off stump, poked to extra cover from the crease
back of a length at middle stump, pushed down the pitch
back of a length at middle stump, flicked to deep square's left
length at middle stump, gets low and connects well on the reverse sweep, only to find backward point
back of a length on leg stump, pushed uppishly to midwicket
full at leg stump, driven back at the bowler
short ball down leg side, looks to pull, gets a top edge that floats past short fine
slider down leg as he backs away to open the off side up. Cramps him and rolls to short fine's left off the inside edge
floated outside off, stretches a long way forward and slaps off the front foot to the point boundary
short outside off stump, punched into the covers where Bavuma dives to his left and holds
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length in the corridor, pushed to extra cover off the back foot
full at off stump, driven to long-off
good length at middle stump, steps out and pushes back down the pitch
length at middle stump, brings out a sweep-pull hybrid, but can't get bat on it. Pitching outside leg
length ball on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket after a step down the track
short and wide outside off, punched to extra cover
full at off stump, driven to extra cover
tossed up outside off, stretches for it and slaps it flat past a diving extra cover
quicker one in the corridor, at a good length. Gets the front leg out of the way and punches to extra cover
tossed up outside off, switches quickly and slaps this reverse sweep past short third man
length outside off, poked into the covers
length at middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket
slider. Back of a length at middle stump. Exposes the stumps and taps it straight to extra cover

dropped by AB de Villiers, running backwards from midwicket. Tossed up at middle stump. He makes room and looks to sweep over midwicket, but gets under it and slices. Long-on barely sprinted, suggesting AB called for it. In the end, he's sliding backwards on his knees and stretching out to try and hold on. Can't do it

well, he nails the sweep next ball and finds deep midwicket. A nothing ball, full and down leg side. Swings hard and connects well, but it's flat and straight to the fielder there who is solid under this
full and wide outside off, nice stride to reach it and drive wide of sweeper cover
full at middle stump, driven back at the bowler who doesn't collect cleanly. Gets a touch on it and it hits the stumps. It's been sent upstairs...he's made his ground. Not out.
floated full and wide outside off, carved to sweeper cover
full outside off, takes it on and slices the drive over cover. Wasn't quite to the pitch

edged and gone! He's kept on taking it away with the angle from around the wickets. Sabbir doesn't account for it as he goes after this full one outside off for yet another drive. Not close to it once again and the edge is taken
full at middle stump, flicked to midwicket
drops it wayyyy short outside off, but the cut shot finds cover point
slider, back of a length and in the corridor. Exposes the stumps, backs away, misses the cut
full at middle stump, flicked to midwicket
slider, good length, off stump. Looks to drive through the off side, gets an inside edge to midwicke
short outside off, sliced straight to short third man
drops short of the bowler Full ball on middle stump. No feet from Mashrafe as he closes the face on it early. Leading edge doesn't carry
good length, in at leg stump. Cops it on the pad as he looks to flick
overpitched on leg stump, clipped to fine leg's left and the outfield is too quick for him to attempt a stop
full outside off, skews the attempted cover drive to third man off the outside half
length on middle stump, poked wide of mid-on
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
good length outside off, looks to drive away from the body, inside edge to midwicket
good length in the corridor, defended into the covers
length outside off, opens the face and drives this past point. Rabada gives chase and drags it back in at the boundary with a dive
edge falls short of De Kock. Batsman is squared up as he fends at this length ball. Plays inside the line, there was no movement
short and outside off, slashes at it and gets an outside edge. No slips in place
good length at off stump, defended down the pitch
pitched up on off, presses forward and drives to mid-off
back of a length and speared down leg for a wide
chest-high short ball on middle, Mehidy controls the hook. He swivels, rolls his wrists, and sends the ball fine of long leg
back of a length and outside off, Mehidy slices the ball away to cover
pitched up on off, driven straight to cover
full around off, smoothly driven off the front foot to mid-off
full and outside off, chipped just wide of silly mid-off
on a length and outside off, Mashrafe strokes it to point
dug short and outside off, Mashrafe stays beside the line and drops it to the same fielder
short and outside off, rushes Mashrafe into a hook. He looks away and top-edges it over mid-on. De Villiers chases hard and scoops the ball back into the field of play
dug in short on middle, pulled with more conviction to deep midwicket
short and angled in on middle, shuffles across off and pats the ball to short midwicket
full on off, Mehidy stays leg side of the ball and drives to mid-off
back of a length on middle, Mashrafe stands tall and smashes it over mid-on for a boundary
on a length and swerves away outside off, beats the outside edge lavishly
hip-high short ball on off, Mashrafe middles a pull to deep square leg
pitched up on off, draws the batsman forward and invites a drive. Played back to the bowler
full and outside off, Mehidy opens the face and eases it behind point
back of a length and skids in on middle to ping the thigh pad, catching the Bangladesh captain in an awkward tangle
floated full and outside off, sneaks under the drive and beats de Kock
Paterson has Mashrafe snicking behind. This was nice and full outside off. A crease-bound Mortaza chases the drive and edges it to the keeper
pitched up on off, driven straight down the ground
full and outside off, Mehidy does not meet the pitch of the ball. He drives... and misses
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Mehidy punches on the up to short cover
full on middle, clears the front leg and flashes a drive to mid-off
dragged down, finishes outside leg, leg-side wide
lobbed up outside off, dips, and beats him on the outside edge
shorter and outside off, forced off the back foot to mid-off. Taskin gets off strike
looped up outside off, Mehidy stretches out and drives this full ball to cover
short on middle and leg, speared to long-on
tossed on off, driven down to mid-off
darted shortish on off, punched out to cover
Dropped by Bavuma at backward point. Short and outside off, the batsman cuts in the air. The ball pops in and pops out
full on off, punched to mid-on
back of a length and angling in at off, clipped away past the right of mid-on
very full on off, sliced away to backward point
full and outside off, carves a drive to cover point
good length and angling in at off, defended
Taskin picks out Duminy at deep midwicket. Floaty legbreak, spins back in, Taskin drags it in the air to hand Tahir his first wicket of the match. SA one away from 3-0
pushed through on middle, swept away behind square
Mehidy backs away outside leg and chops from off stump to backward point
SA sweep Bangladesh 3-0! The stand-in captain AB de Villiers pouches it. Slower legbreak outside off, Mehidy slogs-sweeps it against the break, across the line, to midwicket
